titleStmt.title: Discovery or declaration that the judgement in behalf of the fundamental deliverance of the poor and afflicted, the faithul [sic] and elect is not at all to begin with the Pope of Rome, but from the house of God or His sanctuary ...

Discovery or declaration that the judgement in behalf of the fundamental deliverance of the poor and afflicted, the faithul [sic] and elect is not at all to begin with the Pope of Rome, but from the house of God or His sanctuary ...

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
